name: St. John of Capistrano
summary: John of Capistrano was a Franciscan friar and one of the most famous preachers of his time. He traveled throughout Europe preaching repentance and reform. He was a key figure in the Observant Franciscan reform movement. He also preached a crusade against the Ottoman Turks and was present at the Siege of Belgrade in 1456. He was known for his zeal in combating heresy.
